task.title: How to use the API to create the task
task.shortdesc: Here you will get instructions about how to use the API to create task.

taskbody.prereq:
To successfully use the API to create task:
You must be logged into the application.
Developer access to generate and manage API keys.

step.cmd: Go to Settings > Developer > API Keys.
Use POST /tasks in tools like Postman to create a task.
